November 20,1962
Mr. Capua Waynlck
Executive Vice President
The Richardson Foundation, Inc,
122 East 42nd Street
New York 17, New York
Dear Mr. Way nick:
I enclose the proposal which you were kind enough to
suggest we might prepare as a follow-up to our initial discussion.
As I indicated on the phone, this should be regarded as a
draft and could be modified in accordance with subsequent
discussion. A final proposal would of course spell out various
aspects much more fully, particularly in respect to details of
the specialised projects and their budgets.
We hope the suggestions advanced herein are in accord with
the Foundation's current interests and, as such, will warrant
further discussion. I will be glad to come up to New York at
any time to talk with you.
Sincerely yours.
WGH:ce
Enclosure
William G. Harley
